Detailed Description

Type definitions for data types.

Date:
2007-Dez-11
Author:
S. Rohdemann (C) 2007 Nanotron Technologies
Note:
BuildNumber = "BuildNumber : 7951";

This file contains the generic datatype definitions of the nTRX driver. These type definitions isolate the nTRX code from dependencies on the hardware environment for which the nTRX is compiled.
